001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.authentication;
002
003import com.google.common.base.Preconditions;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.KnownApiVersion;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.authentication.Jpake1aRequest;
010
011import java.util.Arrays;
012
013/**
014 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.authentication.Jpake1aRequest}, opCode 33, size 167
015 *
016 * <br>
017 *
018 * 
019 * <table border='1'>
020 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
021 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>33</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
022 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>167</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
023 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
024 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>minApi</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.KnownApiVersion#API_V3_2}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
025 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#AUTHORIZATION}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
026 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.authentication.Jpake1aRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
027 * </table>
028 */
029@MessageProps(
030    opCode=33, // or 35?
031    size=167,
032    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
033    minApi=KnownApiVersion.API_V3_2,
034    characteristic=Characteristic.AUTHORIZATION,
035    request= Jpake1aRequest.class
036)
037public class Jpake1aResponse extends AbstractCentralChallengeResponse {
038    private int appInstanceId;
039    private byte[] centralChallengeHash;
040
041    public Jpake1aResponse() {}
042
043    public Jpake1aResponse(int appInstanceId, byte[] centralChallengeHash) {
044        parse(buildCargo(appInstanceId, centralChallengeHash));
045        Preconditions.checkState(this.appInstanceId == appInstanceId);
046        Preconditions.checkState(Arrays.equals(this.centralChallengeHash, centralChallengeHash));
047    }
048
049    public Jpake1aResponse(byte[] raw) {
050        parse(raw);
051    }
052
053    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
054        Preconditions.checkArgument(raw.length == props().size(), "size is "+raw.length+" not "+props().size());
055        this.cargo = raw;
056        appInstanceId = Bytes.readShort(raw, 0);
057        centralChallengeHash = Arrays.copyOfRange(raw, 2, 167); // 165 == Request.centralChallenge.length
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * <table border="1">
062     * <caption>Byte layout for Jpake1aResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
063     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
064     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(byte0short) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
065     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(byte0short) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
066     * </table>
067     */
068    public static byte[] buildCargo(int byte0short, byte[] bytes2to167) {
069        return Bytes.combine(Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(byte0short), bytes2to167);
070    }
071
072    public int getAppInstanceId() {
073        return appInstanceId;
074    }
075
076    public byte[] getCentralChallengeHash() {
077        return centralChallengeHash;
078    }
079}
